data.title: Energy Broker CRM Software
data.meta_description: Learn how energy broker CRM software converts retail energy customers and reduces churn with agile quote-to-contract automation powered by Data & AI.
data.text:
Accelerate time to market for new products and services.

Energy Industry Configure, Price, Quote (CPQ)

Grow your books with new energy offerings. Accelerate time to market for new products and service offerings, quickly generate accurate complex C&I quotes, and streamline order configuring, quoting, promotions, and discount approvals consistently across all channels.

Tailor promotions and discounts. Orchestrate your product catalog and customer systems to package and deliver segment-specific rebates, critical peak pricing triggers, or other time-dependent, high value offers.

Manage orders more responsively. Automate the offer and enrollment process to reduce configuration and fulfillment costs, with minimal dependency on legacy systems to keep up with dynamic offerings.

Enable multi-site quoting capabilities. Easily package complex, customized offers and optimize energy supply and rates for multi-site commercial and industrial energy customers.

Scale and innovate fast from your current systems.

Energy and Utilities Cloud

Utilize pre-built integrations to legacy systems. Reduce customization and configure with clicks, not code when you utilize pre-built integrations to legacy systems like SAP, proven batch integrations to SAP and Oracle, and declarative tools.

Streamline processes with minimal coding. Simplify real-time external data integration with a declarative, no-code ETL tool with data mapping and REST interfaces. Bring it all to the front office with guided customer interactions and personalized responses for any channel or device, all with minimal coding.

Reduce development time. Dramatically reduce development time when you take advantage of configurable business processes. In one click, download and deploy seamlessly alongside your existing enterprise integration platform of choice.

Super-charge your key account sales and service teams.

Sales Cloud for Energy and Utilities

Acquire fast and reduce churn. Deliver the perfect offer, every time. Be first to market with new offerings and onboard customers fast, without friction. Make customers feel valued and keep them from switching again by providing responsive, personalized service.

Automate Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM). Automate the contract lifecycle to reduce cycle times, keep cash flows moving, reduce risk, and make it easy for C&I customers. Standardize and digitize the contract process to reduce cost.

Enjoy a 360-degree view of each account. Stop agent swivel-chairing when you unify multiple customer data sources, analytics, and guided business processes into a single, intuitive view using Cards and Lightning Web Components.

Orchestrate your team. Workflow and data integration tools easily deliver intuitive, guided user experiences and orchestrate multiple agents from end to end, all focused on one thing: customer satisfaction.
